quote_last: radio silence was broken with the five words, “Shoplifter apprehended, repeat Shoplifter apprehended.”
title: First Among Equals
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: But he released him immediately because the ladder slipped from under his feet and for an instant he was suspended in air and then he realised that he had died without Communion, without time to repent of anything or to say goodbye to anyone, at
title: Love in the Time of Cholera
author: Gabriel García Márquez
